name: Aryan Deshmukh
profile: Passionate and resourceful engineering student with a strong foundation in software development and a keen interest in emerging technologies. Adept at solving complex problems and developing innovative solutions. Eager to contribute to impactful projects and grow within a dynamic and collaborative environment.

projects.title: Version Control System
description: Rug version control system in Rust, leveraging its strengths in memory safety and performance for efficient source code management and fast versioning.

A very interesting and algorithm centric project. For every functionality of the project finding the best algorithm was a difficult task. Understanding and implementation of Myer’s Difference algorithm was especially challenging and time consuming.

projects.title: Psyche-Care: Your AI Therapist
description: Developed an AI-powered CBT therapy platform using OpenAI's GPT-3.5 and vector embeddings.
Utilized Supabase for storage and Next.js for the web application.
Implemented OpenAI API seemed easier than expected as it is a newer technology.
Difficulty in verifying CBT book efficiency was solved with the help from a psychology professor.

projects.title: Student Database Management System
description: Developed SDMS with Python Flask and MySQL for managing student data in educational institutions.
Facilitates student registration, grade management, attendance tracking, and report generation.
A learning experience in creating a project from scratch.

projects.title: ZivvyIT: Zero Knowledge Solution to Decentralised File Systems
description: ZivvyIt integrates blockchain and zkSNARKs for secure, private file storage with enhanced encryption.
It employs IPFS and Pinata for decentralized storage, ensuring resilience and accessibility in data management solutions.
Faced challenges with zkSNARKs implementation, navigating through various technologies before adopting Mina protocol for seamless integration.

achievements_and_interests: Winner of SoftCodeHack Hackathon by PHICIST Verb-Wise Track: This required the users to implement a web3 project using Verbwire API.
Eyantra (2023-34): Qualified for Eyantra Stage 2 Project competition round in the Track of Astro-Helper-Bot.
Coursera course Certification for Basics of React, and AWS Cloud Technology Consultant(ongoing).
Volunteer At Social Welfare and Development Activity, promoting technical education amongst the elder citizens of the country.
Hobbies includes playing cricket, football, bowling, Snooker, etc, listening to Music, Social hangouts.
